name: Lan's father
content: This male Human was the father of Lan and resided on the planet Alderaan. The day before Alderaan's destruction by the Galactic Empire's first Death Star, Lan and his friends, Mazi and Jez, went to Delaya to watch a smashball tournament. Despite Lan's young age, his father was easily convinced by Mazi to allow them to go. Lan's father later died along with his wife when Alderaan was destroyed.
